body.p:
Florence Ky 1864
To His Excellency
Governor Bramlette
For the reason, that the office of Justice of the Peace interferes with my usual avocations; I herewith send you my resignation of said office in and for the Florence District Boone County Kentucky

Justice Peace
Boone Co
accptd
20th May 1864

Accepted
ascertain who will be suitable appointment
